body.section: Freezer scheduler and Freezer agent in 20 21 are installed on controller nodes and lifecycle manager nodes. They are also installed on compute and VSA nodes but nothing is being backed up there.
If you lose a controller node completely, i.e. the hardware is unusable, the necessary data for the lost controller can be recovered from MySQL.
If you have backed up your data outside the cluster, which is a good idea for complete disaster recovery, you may recover that data using the SSH recovery procedure.
